ActiveEffects.ConfirmDelete: Do you really want to delete effect?

Actor.CharacteristicEdit: Toggle Edit Mode for Characteristic Short Names

Skills.SkillRollTooltip: Shows the skill roll dialog. Shift-clicking rolls a skill check applying no modifier and assumes an average difficulty of 6 or 8
Skills.InvertedSkillRollTooltip: Rolls a skill check applying no modifier and assumes a difficulty of 8. Shift-clicking shows the skill roll dialog

Tabs.FinancesTabTooltip: Cash on Hand, Debt, Pension, Living Costs, etc.
Tabs.InventoryTabTooltip: Weapons, Armor, Augments, Equipment & Tools, Consumables and Attachements

Movement.MovementConfigHint: Configure the movement speed and special movement attributes of this creature.

Roll.TiedRoll: Tied contested / opposed roll. No winner.
Roll.RequestRollClip:
Request Roll

Select any Tokens from which you would like to request a skill roll. A pop-up dialog opens where you can select the particulars of the roll.

Disable Toolclips in the Settings

Handlebars.CantShowCharacteristic: You need to reselect the characteristic for all skills marked with XXX. Sorry...

Component.pctHullPerUnit: Percent of base hull value per unit

Skills.SimplifiedSkillNameDescription:
Used in roll formulas as @skills._SKILL_NAME_.
@skills._SKILL_NAME__ defaults to zero if the skill is missing or below zero.

Traits.ShortDescAndEffects: Short description and list of effects

Ship.ActorMustBeSelectedForAction: Since there are multiple actors, one must be selected to perform the action
Ship.CantDropActorIfPositionIsNotOnShip: You can't drop a Traveller on a ship position that is not on a ship
Ship.InvalidDocumentForShipPosition: This document type is invalid for ship positions. Only skills can be dropped here.
Ship.MakesChatRollAction: Uses the _ACTION_NAME_ action from the _POSITION_NAME_ position.
Ship.ActionHitsAndDamage: Hits _WHILE_USING_with an effect of _EFFECT_VALUE_ causing _DAMAGE_TOTAL_ points of standard damage
Ship.Name: Name
Ship.skillTooltip:
Possible options:
Skill
Skill|Alternative Skill 1|...
Skills/ATR
Skills/ 8+
Skills/ATR 8+
Skills/ATR|ATR2
Ship.fireTooltip:
Possible options:
Skill
Skill|Alternative Skill 1|...
Skills/ATR
Skills/ 8+
Skills/ATR|ATR2 8+

Migration.Completed: Twodsix System Migration to version {version} completed!
Migration.DoNotClose: Migrating Twodsix to {version}. Do not close your game or shut down your server.
Migration.MigrationError0.6.25: Migration error: Couldn't parse price for ${name}, it was ${price} but is now 0.

absoluteBonusValueForEachTimeIncrement.hint: Leave empty to use default (+/-1). Not currently used.
absoluteBonusValueForEachTimeIncrement.name: What bonus/penalty to give per each time increment change in a task.

absoluteCriticalEffectValue.hint: Defaults to 99, which means that effect is ignored.
absoluteCriticalEffectValue.name: What effect is required for a throw to be considered a critical success/failure (i.e. be colored green/red).

alternativeShort1.hint: Short name for first alternative characteristic. It should be four characters or fewer.
alternativeShort1.name: Short name for alternative characteristic 1

alternativeShort2.hint: Short name for second alternative characteristic. It should be four characters or fewer.
alternativeShort2.name: Short name for alternative characteristic 2

autofireRulesUsed.hint: Select which variant's auto/burst fire rules should be used.
autofireRulesUsed.name: Select which variant's auto/burst fire rules should be used.

automateDamageRollOnHit.hint: checked=Roll damage, modified by effect of skill roll. unchecked=Don't roll damage.
automateDamageRollOnHit.name: Automatically roll damage on skill rolls that hit (i.e. get effect > 0) with items that do damage?

criticalNaturalAffectsEffect.hint: checked=Regardless of success consider a natural 2 to have an effect of -1 and a 12 to have an effect of 0, unchecked=Use normal rules
criticalNaturalAffectsEffect.name: Whether a natural 2 or 12 should have special treatment as regards to success/failure.

defaultTokenSettings.hint: Automatically set advised prototype token settings to newly created Actors.
defaultTokenSettings.name: Default Prototype Token Settings

difficultiesAsTargetNumber.hint: checked=Use target number rather than modifier for difficulties, unchecked=Use modifiers
difficultiesAsTargetNumber.name: Use target numbers rather than modifiers for difficulties.

difficultyListUsed.hint: Select which variant's difficulty list should be used.
difficultyListUsed.name: Select which variant's difficulty list should be used.

effectOrTotal.hint: checked=Show effect (i.e. roll+modifiers-target number, usually 6 or 8), unchecked=Show total (i.e. roll+modifiers)
effectOrTotal.name: Show effect or total roll value for skill and characteristic rolls.

ExperimentalFeatures.hint: checked=Boldly use ugly and buggy experimental features that just maybe won't delete your game world, unchecked=Hide them like any sane person would
ExperimentalFeatures.name: Show ugly, buggy and unfinished features. I.e., kind of like all the other features that are not hidden by this flag. :)

hideUntrainedSkills.hint: checked=Show pseudo-skill 'Untrained' instead of all untrained skills. unchecked=Show all untrained skills
hideUntrainedSkills.name: Hide all untrained skills, instead show a single pseudo-skill named 'Untrained'. This also makes it so new skills are added at 0 instead of the untrained skill value.
hideUntrainedSkills.warningReset: After saving the system settings all skills using the pseudo-skill Untrained will be permanently reset to using no skill.This action cannot be undone.
hideUntrainedSkills.warningUpdateWeapon: After saving the system settings all actors' weapons that do not have a skill will be updated to use the pseudo-skill Untrained.This action cannot be undone.

armorDamageFormula.hint: Use VTT roll math without dice terms '@damage'/'@effectiveArmor' are replaced with the damage/effective armor. default behaviour: "@damage-@effectiveArmor"
armorDamageFormula.name: Armor damage reduction formula

invertSkillRollShiftClick.hint: Clicking on a skill roll or dragging damage to a character normally shows a dialog, shift-clicking applies default values (Average skill roll or automatic damage distribution). Checking this box swaps this behavior.
invertSkillRollShiftClick.name: Invert behavior for shift-clicking for skill rolls and shift-dragging for taking damage

lifebloodInsteadOfCharacteristics.hint: Show END and 'Lifeblood' (uses STR below the covers) as characteristics. Useful for Cepheus Atom, Barbaric!, etc.
lifebloodInsteadOfCharacteristics.name: Show END and 'Lifeblood' (STR) as characteristics.

modifierForZeroCharacteristic.hint: Leave empty to use default (-2). Does not automatically recalculate modifiers for existing characters.
modifierForZeroCharacteristic.name: Modifier for characteristic value of zero.

ruleset.hint: This will configure the below settings with the best options for the given ruleset. Note that the rulesets at the top are the best supported ones. See https://github.com/xdy/twodsix-foundryvtt/blob/master/docs/docs.md for details. Rules relating to the ruleset are marked with a green border. Any changes to settings set by the ruleset will be marked with an orange border.
ruleset.name: Ruleset

debugSettings.hint: Configure/View the debugging and experimental features settings.
debugSettings.name: Experimental & Debugging Settings

itemSettings.hint: Configure the item fields that are shown.
itemSettings.name: Item Settings

showAlternativeCharacteristics.hint: Base: core six plus PSI. Alternative: core six plus alternative. All: core six plus PSI plus Alternative
showAlternativeCharacteristics.name: Select characteristics to display

showContaminationBelowLifeblood.hint: Show Contamination below Lifeblood. Only useful along with the 'show END and lifeblood' setting.
showContaminationBelowLifeblood.name: Show Contamination below Lifeblood.

ShowDamageType.hint: checked=Show the 'Damage Type' field, unchecked=Hide it
ShowDamageType.name: Show the 'Damage Type' field on weapon sheets

showHeroPoints.hint: Show Hero Points counter on actor sheet.
showHeroPoints.name: Show Hero Points

usePDFPagerForRefs.hint: Use with PDF Pager to show references.  The format must be '[code name] [page number]'. If setting is false, uri links to references are used instead.
usePDFPagerForRefs.name: Use PDF-Pager module to show references

ShowLawLevel.hint: checked=Show the 'Law Level' field, unchecked=Hide it
ShowLawLevel.name: Show the 'Law Level' field on weapon sheets

showLifebloodStamina.hint: Show Lifeblood and Stamina characteristics on actor sheet.  Damage will be applied to these characteristics.  Useful for Cepheus Deluxe.
showLifebloodStamina.name: Show Lifeblood and Stamina characteristics and use for damage.

ShowRangeBandAndHideRange.name: Show 'Range Band' and *hide* 'Range' on weapon sheets and the character sheet

ShowRateOfFire.hint: checked=Show the 'Rate of Fire' field, unchecked=Hide it
ShowRateOfFire.name: Show the 'Rate of Fire' field on weapon sheets

ShowRecoil.name: Show the 'Recoil' field on weapon sheets

ShowDoubleTap.hint: checked=Show the 'Double Tap' field, unchecked=Hide it
ShowDoubleTap.name: Show the 'Double Tap' field on weapon sheets

showSingleComponentColumn.hint: Show the ship components list as a single row.
showSingleComponentColumn.name: Ship components listed as single row

showBandwidth.hint: Show the used and available bandwidth for computers and software.
showBandwidth.name: Ship computing bandwidth

ShowWeaponType.hint: checked=Show the 'Weapon Type' field, unchecked=Hide it
ShowWeaponType.name: Show the 'Weapon Type' field on weapon sheets

showWeightUsage.hint: Display ship weight values instead of power on ship sheet.
showWeightUsage.name: Show Weight instead of Power management on Ship Sheet

systemMigrationVersion.hint: Records the schema version for the Twodsix system. (Don't modify this unless you know what you are doing)
systemMigrationVersion.name: System Schema Version

termForAdvantage.hint: Don't use the same as for termForDisadvantage...
termForAdvantage.name: What you want to call rolls with advantage (3d6kh2).

termForDisadvantage.hint: Don't use the same as for termForAdvantage...
termForDisadvantage.name: What you want to call rolls with disadvantage (3d6kl2).

useFoundryStandardStyle.hint: Use Foundry's default style for user interface.  This should make some modules more compatible with TWODSIX
useFoundryStandardStyle.name: Use Foundry Standard Style

useModuleFixStyle.hint: Modifies CSS style to correct identified style issues for certain modules when using the Twodsix style.  It doesn't work when using Foundry default style.
useModuleFixStyle.name: Correct some css style issues due to modules and default Twodsix style.

useShipAutoCalcs.hint: When enabled, the ship summary power, weight, bandwidth, and price statistics are calculated based on component vaules. Otherwise, values are input by user.
useShipAutoCalcs.name: Automatically calculate summary ship power, weight, bandwidth, and price values

useSystemDefaultTokenIcon.hint: Use Foundry VTT system default token icon (mystery man) instead of Twodsix default icon when creating new actor.  Check this setting when using custom images so that the system automatically sets token image to be the same as the actor image.
useSystemDefaultTokenIcon.name: Use Foundry VTT rather than Twodsix default token icon for new actors.

useWoundedStatusIndicators.hint: Uses status indicators to indicate wounded status and automatically roll unconsciousness saves on serious wounds. Roll modifiers below are applied to all rolls.
useWoundedStatusIndicators.name: Display wounded status indicators and apply roll modifiers

minorWoundsRollModifier.hint: The modifier for all rolls when actor has minor wounds (negative subtracts from roll or increases DM).
minorWoundsRollModifier.name: Roll Modifier for minor wounds

seriousWoundsRollModifier.hint: The modifier for all rolls when actor has serious wounds (negative subtracts from roll or increases DM).
seriousWoundsRollModifier.name: Roll Modifier for serious wounds

weightModifierForWornArmor.hint: Factor to multiply the weight value of a armor if it is currently equipped.
weightModifierForWornArmor.name: Factor to multiply the weight value of a equipped armor.

useProseMirror.hint: Use the embedded HTML editor for larger input blocks.
useProseMirror.name: Use ProseMirror editor for larger input blocks.

showIcons.hint: Use icons instead of text for biographical information.  Icons always shown when using lifeblood and stamina.
showIcons.name: Use icons for biographical information.

maxComponentHits.hint: The number of hits at which the component is destroyed
maxComponentHits.name: Maximum hits for a component.

mortgagePayment.hint: The number to divide the ship cost by to determine the monthly mortgage payments over 40 years.  A value of 240 means that the ship cost is divided 240 to dermine the monthly payment.
mortgagePayment.name: Mortgage Payment Terms.

massProductionDiscount.hint: The cost savings for ship construction due to being mass produced. A value of 0.1 means that 10% is deducted from the base price of the ship.
massProductionDiscount.name: Discount for ship being mass produced

reverseHealingOrder.hint: Healing using token bar input heals in the same order that auto damage occurs. The first characteristic damaged is also the first healed.  If this setting is false, healing starts with last characterisic and works backwards.
reverseHealingOrder.name: Reverse characteristic healing order

maxEncumbrance.hint: Formula to calculate maximum encumbrance for actor.
maxEncumbrance.name: Maximum Encumbrance Formula

allowDropOnIcon.hint: Items can be dropped and added to actors directly on top of icon without opening actor sheet.  Duplicate items increase inventory quantity.  Chat damage items will apply damage.
allowDropOnIcon.name: Allow Items to be droped onto icons

defaultMovement.hint: The default movement/walk for new travellers (typically a minor action), e.g. 10 for 10m
defaultMovement.name: The default movement walk rate

defaultMovementUnits.hint: The default movement/walk units for new travellers (typically a minor action), e.g. m for 10m
defaultMovementUnits.name: The default movement units for the walk rate

useEncumbrance.hint: Use encumbrance rules (if they exist) when displaying movement with drag ruler.
useEncumbrance.name: Use system encumbrance rules for drag ruler

addEffectForShipDamage.hint: The ship attack effect value is added to the damage roll.
addEffectForShipDamage.name: Add effect to ship damage

autoAddUnarmed.hint: When checked (true), the unarmed weapon will be automatically added to the inventory for new actors (per rules settings).
autoAddUnarmed.name: Automatically add unarmed weapon to new actors

unarmedDamage.hint: Dice formula for unarmed damage used when Unarmed is automatically added to actors.
unarmedDamage.name: Unarmed Damage Formula

showTimeframe.hint: Add timeframe options to skill / characteristic rolls/
showTimeframe.name: Show Timeframe in Roll Dialog

showStatusIcons.hint: Overlay condition icons on side of actor images on sheets.
showStatusIcons.name: Show condition icons on traveller sheets

showHullAndArmor.hint: option to choose information in protection area of vehicle sheets.  Options are armor only (a plain text box), thresholds (roll values for regular and critical hits) and armor, hull, structre (table of three damage fields).
showHullAndArmor.name: Protection values on vehicle sheets

addEffectToManualDamage.hint: This option addts the effect to a manual damage roll from the most recent chat message.
addEffectToManualDamage.name: Add effect when making manual damage

showRangeSpeedNoUnits.hint: Omit the range and speed units (e.g. km/hr) on vehicle sheet.
showRangeSpeedNoUnits.name: Don't show range and speed units

showInitiativeButton.hint: Show an initiative roll button on actor sheet on skills tab.
showInitiativeButton.name: Show Initiative Roll Button

showSkillCountsRanks.hint: Show a count of the number of trained skills and the sum of the levels (rank) at the bottom of the skills tab.
showSkillCountsRanks.name: Show Skills Count and Ranks on Traveller Sheet

showComponentSummaryIcons.hint: Show summary icons for components below ship image.
showComponentSummaryIcons.name: Show Component Summary Icons

showSpells.hint: Show spells lists on actor sheets.
showSpells.name: Show Spells

sorcerySkill.hint: The name of the skill used for spellcasting / sorcery.
sorcerySkill.name: Sorcery skill name

useNationality.hint: Display nationality field instead of home world field on actor sheet.
useNationality.name: Display nationality rather than home world

animalsUseHits.hint: Animals have only one damage statistic: hits.
animalsUseHits.name: Animals use hits for damage

animalsUseLocations.hint: Animals are described by location found instead of type and niche.
animalsUseLocations.name: Animals use location instead of type

displayReactionMorale.hint: Show reaction and morale information on animal sheet.
displayReactionMorale.name: Show animal reaction and morale

robotsUseHits.hint: Robots have only one damage statistic: hits.
robotsUseHits.name: Robots use hits for damage

showComponentRating.hint: Show rating field on ship component item sheet.
showComponentRating.name: Show component rating

showComponentDM.hint: Show DM field on ship component item sheet.
showComponentDM.name: Show component DM

useEncumbranceStatusIndicators.hint: Uses status indicators to indicate encumbered status. Roll modifiers below are applied to all physical characteristic rolls.
useEncumbranceStatusIndicators.name: Display encumbrance status indicators and apply roll modifiers

encumbranceFraction.hint: The fraction applied to the maximum encumbrance formula to indicate actor is encumbered.  For example, a value of 0.5 would mean the actor becomes encumbered when carried weight exceeds one half of maximum encumbrance.
encumbranceFraction.name: Fraction of maximum encumbrance when encumbrance roll modifier applies

encumbranceModifier.hint: The number to add to the physical (STR, END, DEX) characteristic modifier when encumbered. For example, -1 indicates one should be subtracted for all rolls involving physical characterisitcs.
encumbranceModifier.name: Roll modifier using physical characteristics when actor is encumbered

transferDroppedItems.hint: Overrides the default Foundry behavior of copying on drag-drop to transfering items (items removed from source actor) when drag-dropping equipment between actors.
transferDroppedItems.name: Transfer rather than copy dropped equipment on actors

allowDragDropOfLists.hint: Allow items in lists to be moved by drag and drop rather than sorting alphabetically.
allowDragDropOfLists.name: Allow Drag-Drop in Lists

useDodgeParry.hint: Add a roll penalty to refect targets ability to dodge / parry.  A target must be selected and the skill name for weapon action must match.
useDodgeParry.name: Use Dodge / Parry Attack Modifers

showModifierDetails.hint: Show roll moddifier values in roll flavor line, e.g. STR(+1) versus STR.
showModifierDetails.name: Display roll modifiers in chat roll text

defaultColor.hint: Change the theme main color. Delete value to reset.
defaultColor.name: Set Default Color

lightColor.hint: Change the theme highlight color. Delete value to reset.
lightColor.name: Set Highlight Color

useItemActiveEffects.hint: Use Item Active Effects.  WARNING: may result is odd system behavior.
useItemActiveEffects.name: Use Item Active Effects

showFeaturesInChat.hint: Show item features text at bottom of chat messages for rolls.
showFeaturesInChat.name: Show Item Features in Chat

showHitsChangesInChat.hint: Show a whispered chat message to GM when damage/healing is appled to an actor.
showHitsChangesInChat.name: Show damage / healing chat message to GM

encumbFractionOneSquare.hint: This is a Drag Ruler module setting to set the one 'square' movement limit.  The fraction applied to the maximum encumbrance formula. It only applies when the OTHER ruleset is in use.
encumbFractionOneSquare.name: Fraction of maximum encumbrance for 1.5m/5ft of movement

encumbFraction75pct.hint: This is a Drag Ruler module setting to set the 75 percent movement limit.  The fraction applied to the maximum encumbrance formula. It only applies when the OTHER ruleset is in use.
encumbFraction75pct.name: Fraction of maximum encumbrance for 75 percent movement rate

useTabbedViews.hint: Use a tabbbed sheet for longer item sheets rather than a flat sheet.
useTabbedViews.name: Use tabbed views for weapons and component sheets

damageTypeOptions.hint: A comma separated list that specifies the allowable damage types.
damageTypeOptions.name: Damage and Protection Types

animalTypesIndependentofNiche.hint: Animals may have any type, indpependent of the niche chosen.
animalTypesIndependentofNiche.name: Animal Types Are Independent of Niche

reduceStatusIcons.hint: Remove unneeded status conditions from default Foundry that don't apply to a science fiction setting, e.g. cursed. WARNING: changing this setting from true (checked) to false (unchecked) will reload the world.
reduceStatusIcons.name: Simplify default condition icon list for a science fiction setting

overrideDamageRoll.hint: Set the automatic damage roll to a world scope and override client settings.  WARNING: Requires all clients to reload when setting changed.
overrideDamageRoll.name: Override automatic damage rolls for clients to GM setting.

autoDamageTarget.hint: Automatically damage a targeted actor without showing the damage pop-up on a sucessful attack roll.
autoDamageTarget.name: Auto Damage Targets

useDegreesOfSuccess.hint: Show degrees of success.  The 'Other' setting uses exceptional, marginal, and average descriptions for success & failure. The 'Cepheus Engine' setting does not use the marginal descriptor (per rules).  The 'None' setting omits all success or failure descriptions.
useDegreesOfSuccess.name: Show degrees of success for non-attack rolls

Settings.defaultDamageOptions: Ballistic, Bludgeoning, Corrosive, EMP, Energy, Fire, Laser, Piercing, Poison, Plasma, Psionic, Rad, Slashing, Smoke, Stun

Errors.NoSkillForSkillRoll: You tried to perform a skill roll without specifying a skill
Errors.NoCharacteristicForRoll: You tried to perform a characteristics roll without specifying a characteristic
Errors.NoROFForAttack: Rate of fire must be specified for this attack
Errors.NoAmmo: You are out of ammunition. You need to reload before shooting!
Errors.EmptyConsumable: There is no consumable supply left.  You need to refill!
Errors.OnlyOwnedItems: Can only drop to items that are owned by an actor
Errors.DraggingSomething: Dragging something that can't be dragged
Errors.OnlyDropConsumables: Only consumables can be dropped on an item.
Errors.CouldNotFindItem: Could not find an item with id: _ITEM_ID_
Errors.DraggedCompendiumIsNotItem: The dragged compendium object is not an item.
Errors.InvalidRollFormula: Not a valid damage roll formula.
Errors.TraitsandSkillsNoConsumables: Spells, Traits and Skills can't have consumables.

Warnings.ActorMissingItem: Your controlled Actor does not have an item with id: _ITEM_ID_
Warnings.MaxStatVal: The value exceededs the maximum stat value
Warnings.StatValBelowZero: The value cannot be below zero
Warnings.DecreaseEnduranceFirst: Endurance/Stamina should be decreased before other stats
Warnings.CantAutoDamage: Automatic damage of ship or vehicle is not supported
Warnings.CantDropOnToken: Dropping items on ship or vehicle tokens is not supported
Warnings.CantDragOntoActor: This item can't be dragged onto this actor
Warnings.CantDragActorOntoActor: Can only drag actor reference onto an active ProseMirror text box.
Warnings.PDFPagerNotInstalled: PDF Pager must be installed to use source links.
Warnings.NoSpecfiedLink: No document and page specified for document link.
Warnings.LackPermissionToDamage: You lack sufficient permissions on target actor.
Warnings.MultipleActorsFound: Multiple actors found. Cannot apply damage.
Warnings.EncumbranceFormulaInvalid: Encumbrance Formula is not valid.  Value is set to zero.
Warnings.NoActiveToken: Actor does not have an active token in scene.
Warnings.InvalidReactionInputs: Reaction roll cannot be made as attack and flee inputs are invalid.
Warnings.AnimalsCantHoldPositions: Animals cant be placed in ship positions
Warnings.CantEditCreateInCargo: Can not edit or create effects while in cargo
Warnings.NoActorSelected: An actor must be selected or controlled
Warnings.NoSkillSelected: Must select a skill to make a roll
Warnings.NoDamageForWeapon: This weapon has not specified the damage it does.
Warnings.CantEditEffect: Can't edit effect for item that is embedded in non-Actor.
Warnings.CantCreateEffect: Can't create an effect for item that is embedded in non-Actor.
Warnings.CantDeleteEffect: Can't delete an effect for item that is embedded in non-Actor.
Warnings.PlayerDoesNotHavePermission: Player does not have permission to execute macro.
Warnings.NoDamageToApply: Damage or healing values must greater than zero.
Warnings.MissingUntrainedSkill: Actor is missing untrained skill. Reload application to fix.
Warnings.TooManyTargets: More targets than the number of attacks, targets will be chosen in order selected.
